content: The Rat Archer's Spirit Power allows you to take the form of the Rat and shoot a volley of flaming arrows at your foes, dealing a decent amount of damage. Having the Rat Archer equipped as your Spirit also reduces the Stamina cost of Staff Spin, which is an incredibly handy move, especially in places where there are a lot of archers present.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Rat_Archer_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Rat Archer Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Rat Archer Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Rat Archer's Spirit Power allows you to take the form of the Rat and shoot a volley of flaming arrows at your foes, dealing a decent amount of damage. Having the Rat Archer equipped as your Spirit also reduces the Stamina cost of Staff Spin, which is an incredibly handy move, especially in places where there are a lot of archers present.
